document_data.name: Finder's Stone
document_data.creator: [[Finder Wyvernspur]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Finder's Stone''' was a powerful [[artifact]] created by [[Finder Wyvernspur]] in an attempt to achieve immortality through his songs.
document_data.Abilities: It was made by inserting [[para-elemental ice]] into an existing minor artifact, also named a [[finder's stone]].Â It contained magical recordings of Finder performing his songs, and the finder's stone's original detection powers.
document_data.History: The stone was destroyed so the para-elemental ice could be used to destroy [[Moander]].
